lines

public BooleanGrid lines(BooleanGrid shrunk,
                         double dist)
This assumes that shrunk is this bitmap offset by dist from a previous calculation. It grows shrunk by -dist, then subtracts that from itself. The result is a bitmap of all the thin lines in this pattern that were discarded by the original offset (plus some noise at places square convex corners that have grown back rounded).

Parameters:
shrunk -
dist -
Returns:

offset

public BooleanGrid offset(double dist)
Offset the pattern by a given real-world distance. If the distance is negative the pattern is shrunk; if it is positive it is grown;

Parameters:
dist -
Returns:

complement

public BooleanGrid complement()
Complement a grid N.B. the grid doesn't get bigger, even though the expression it contains may now fill the whole of space.

Returns:
